Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and developed to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This product offers unparalleled benefits and capabilities that we believe could significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its exceptional value and unique features, I am extending an exclusive offer for you to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $950000. This opportunity is tailored to recognize your discerning taste and commitment to excellence. I look forward to discussing how this product can contribute to your success. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,200,000
